original_title: Ukrainian arrested in Italy over Nord Stream sabotage – German prosecutors — RT World News
article_summary: US President Donald Trump urges Ukrainian President Vladimir Zelensky to show flexibility in negotiations with Russian President Vladimir Putin to end the Russia-Ukraine conflict. The talks follow Trump's summit with Putin in Alaska and a meeting in Washington with Zelensky, European leaders, NATO, and the European Commission. The US is also facing challenges in building a naval drone fleet, according to a Reuters report.</s>
